key_name: According to my information, as a result of today's draw, the *%s* of the day is - %s

me_header: %s, you are already the *%s* of the day %d times

sentences: So... who is the *%s* of the day today?
_The military satellite_ is launched, access codes inside...
(Grumbles) Could have been working at work instead
_The capture of the suspect is in progress..._
_Initiating the search_ for the *winner* of the day...
_The military satellite_ is launched, access codes inside...
What? Where? When? And you are the *winner* of the day -
_The capture of the suspect is in progress..._
Aha! Congratulations! Today you are a *winner* -
And the wonderful person of the day today... oh, sorry, just a *winner* -
_System compromised. Damage inflicted. Countermeasures planning initiated._
_The military satellite_ is launched, access codes inside...
Aha! Congratulations! Today you are a *winner* -
_Come on, let's see who's cool here..._
